channel.title: World Revolution Radio
channel.description:
The Propaganda has begun!!
Music from all mankind
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Propaganda has Begun! Music From all Mankind
channel.itunes:summary: The sound man made when he beat out the first note. The underground airwaves are set to be freed by DJ Capote spinning Music from Bali to Spain, analog to digital, tribal to hip hop, lounge to electronica/hardcore, music for all cultures and all vibes. Check ou the PODCAST visit: worldrevolutionradio.com or itunes podcast also youtube.com/WorldRevolutionRadio
channel.itunes:author: World_ Revolution _Radio

item.title: WorldRevolutionRadioTransmission11
item.description: 1.Wendy Carlos Rachel Elkind: The Shining Movie Soundtrack (Stanley Kubrick) Opening Movie Theme-United Kingdom 1980 2.Bauhaus: Bela Lugosi's Dead- Crackle United Kingdom 1979 3.Métal Urbain: Panik- Les hommes morts sont dangereux (The dead men are dangerous) France 1980 4.Combat Noise: Immolation Command- For Military Supremacy(Demo) Cuba 1999 5.Northern Cree: Pow-Wow Canada 6.Urban Dance Squad: Deeper Shade Of Soul- Mental Floss for the Globe Netherlands 1989 7.Carl Bradney: Slipping into Darkness- Jamaica 1975 8.Charanga Cakewalk: El Indio- Loteria de la Cumbia Lounge Columbia 2004 9.Suprême NTM - Assasin De La Police Live France 1998 10.Hayvanlar Alemi: Kazan- GaGa Turkey 2007
